scripts.docker:stop: docker stop $(docker ps | grep rss-proxy-dev | awk '{print $1}') &>/dev/null
scripts.build:dev: cd docker/dev && docker build -t rss-proxy-dev -f Dockerfile .
scripts.build:playground: cd ../playground && npm run build -- --prod && npm pack
scripts.build:core: cd ../core && npm run build && npm pack
scripts.prebuild:prod: npm run build:playground && npm run copy:playground && npm run build:core && npm run copy:core
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:proxy && rm -rf docker/prod/.build-cache && mkdir -p docker/prod/.build-cache && cp package.json docker/prod/.build-cache && cp -rf dist/@rss-proxy/proxy dist/@rss-proxy/rss-proxy-core-0.0.0.tgz dist/@rss-proxy/rss-proxy-playground-0.0.0.tgz docker/prod/.build-cache && cd docker/prod && docker build -t rss-proxy-prod -f Dockerfile .
scripts.run:prod: npm run build:prod && docker run -p 80:3000 -t rssproxy-prod
